name: Johnny GO
description:
- Become the best assassin in the world and eliminate all of your enemies one by one. -- Use your surroundings to hide and try to be invisible.
- Navigate using simple drag to move controls
- Lots of challenging puzzles where you can test your assassination skills
- Beautiful scale model-style visuals
- Different enemy types with unique and deadly behaviors
- Different ways of completing each level, silently or forcefully

Thanks for playing Johnny GO.
